org.ralasafe.user
Class User

java.lang.Object
  org.ralasafe.user.User

public class User
extends java.lang.Object

The user class. A user may contains many attributes of any types( Integer, Float, String, Date, SomeYourClass ). A user must contains attribute named "id", which is the identity of user.

Generally, we write config file usermetadata.xml, then install it through url: $yourWebapp/ralasafe/userTypeMng.
